title: Bombtrack’s new BSA-47 threaded bottom bracket standard is the best of both worlds!
content:
Really, BSA-47… another new bottom bracket standard? Bombtrack has always told us they were proponents of easy-to-use, reliable bottom brackets. They started to transition  to T47 bottom brackets for all of their new and updated frames two years ago.
